name: Eat for Eight Bucks: Hot Mushroom Sandwiches with Sweet Potato Fries
description: [Photograph: Robin Bellinger] Shopping List 2 portobello mushrooms: $3.74 2 English muffins (pro-rated): $1.40 Parsley (pro-rated): $0.75 1 pound sweet potatoes: $1.69 Pantry items: Garlic, butter, mustard, olive oil, salt Total cost (for 2 portions): $7.58 As a child I...

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Mash together the butter, garlic, and parsley.
When the oven is hot, put the mushrooms gills-up in a baking dish and smear their exposed undersides thickly with garlic butter. Bake for about 20 minutes, until the mushrooms are juicy and black.
